short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate and create flashcards on any website or YouTube. Study the flashcards on your mobile device.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to Use:

- Highlight any word or phrase on a website and click the popup button
- Vocably creates top-quality flashcards that you can save
- Review flashcards in the iOS or Android app

Bonus: study with YouTube subtitles (beta). Hold Alt (or Option ‚å• on Mac) to highlight words in subtitles.

Learn multiple languages.

See supported languages at https://vocably.pro
